Name: Michael Kors Ladies' Ritz Chronograph Watch
Content: Stunning and stylish, this ladies Michael Kors watch is the perfect choice. It has a stainless steel case with an attractive detailed bezel. Features include chronograph, date function, mother of pearl dial and gem hour markers. This watch is powered by a quality Japanese quartz movement and fastens with a stainless steel bracelet. The piece comes with a Michael Kors presentation box. ©
